javadoc: Command object for performing PPC disassembly when VLE instructions are supported.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: startSet
params.comment:
set of addresses to be the start of a disassembly.  The
 Command object will attempt to start a disassembly at each address in this set.

params.name: restrictedSet
params.comment:
addresses that can be disassembled.
 a null set implies no restrictions

params.name: vleMode
params.comment:
pass true if the disassembling in PowerISA VLE Mode, otherwise
 normal disassembly will be performed.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: restrictedSet
params.comment:
addresses that can be disassembled.
 a null set implies no restrictions

params.name: vleMode
params.comment:
pass true if the disassembling in PowerISA VLE Mode, otherwise
 normal disassembly will be performed.

name: PowerPCDisassembleCommand
comment: Command object for performing PPC disassembly when VLE instructions are supported.
